channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My son’s primary school is insisting he calls a non-binary teacher ‘Mx’

Amusement park ride in Saudi Arabia collapses and injures more than 20 people

Trump admin live updates: Trump calls on Fed board to take 'control' if rates not cut
item.description: President Trump is escalating his attacks on Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell after the Fed held interest rates steady this week.

item.title: U.S. envoy Steve Witkoff and Mike Huckabee visit Gaza aid site

item.title: Stocks tumble after Trump unveils sweeping new tariffs
item.description: Trump signed an executive order late Thursday slapping tariffs on 70 countries.

item.title: Hurricane plan for Florida's Alligator Alcatraz heavily redacted, raising concerns
item.description: Florida's redacted hurricane plan for the Alligator Alcatraz migrant center is drawing calls for transparency from lawmakers.

item.title: Canadian wildfire smoke brings poor air quality to Midwest
item.description: Wildfire smoke from Canada is blanketing the skies in the Midwest, leaving millions with dangerous breathing conditions.

item.title: Kindergarten vaccination rates fall as exemptions rise
item.description: Vaccination coverage among kindergartners decreased for all reported vaccines during the 2024 to 2025 school year, data posted to the CDC website show...

item.title: WATCH: Supersized stick insect discovered in Australia
item.description: Scientists in Australia have discovered a giant new species of stick insect, which is over 15 inches long.

item.title: Judge blocks Trump administration from ending protections for 60,000 from Central America and Nepal
WATCH: New York City Mayor Eric Adams speaks at NYPD officer's funeral
item.description: New York City Mayor Eric Adams spoke about his visit with late officer Didarul Islam’s father, and the pain of parents having to bury their children.
